channel.title: Is it possible?
channel.description:
Okay so i leave my server up as i leave my computer on 24/7
Just wondering if it is dangerous to leave my server up 24/7 without me watching it.. Is there anyway somebody can hack INTO my computer while i am gone??
sorry i havn't done this stuff for awhile.. sorry if i am in wrong section

item.title: Is it possible?
item.dc:creator: @regesterd regesterd
item.description:
@regesterd wrote:

[quote=“darkdemon501, post:6, topic:335560”]K thank you for the help guys…

AND how can i change the name of the server?? Like what files hold the name and the MESSAGE when you log into the server?[/quote]

in your source look for client.java and open that up, then earch for “weclome” or what ever the login message is and change it to what you want, save,compile and start ur server.

make sure nothing is runnin(like your source) when your compiling =]

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible?
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

yes there is this thing called a bot net and trojan and as long as you download a source made from java with a .bat (batch) file that contains only the server running materials then no one can get in your computer, i also recommend using virtualbox i have a windows 7, xp, vista, and mandriva iso for yah if you want. i also have a tutorial on how to use it

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

but just for stability i suggest using an auto restarter or it might crash/get laggy

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible?
item.dc:creator: @darkdemon501 darkdemon501
item.description:
@darkdemon501 wrote:

regesterd:

no no-one can “HACK INTO” your computer, only thing they can do that’s risky is null your server-i suggest you find a anti-null or some sort of thing. =]

alright cool i don’t care asmuch about that because i can always make a new server or refresh/recompile.
Thanks

Read full topic
